caption.p: Comparative PR-RT immune escape map for Mexico and Canada/United States. The escape map shows the location of HLA-associated polymorphisms in HIV-1 subtype B PR-RT sequences from Mexico ( n = 1,529) and Canada/United States ( n = 1,555). (A) PR positions 1 to 99 and RT positions 1 to 200; (B) RT positions 201 to 335. Features of this map are the same as those seen in Fig. 4. The complete list of associations can be found in Tables S7 and S8 in the supplemental material.
